subject: Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Garrett Wittels, who is four games short of Robin Ventura’s N.C.A.A.-record 58-game streak, is bringing a positive light to Florida International.
snippet: Garrett Wittels, who is four games short of Robin Ventura’s N.C.A.A.-record 58-game streak, is bringing a positive light to Florida International.
